emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '2 cloves of garlic' is best matched with 'garlic, raw' because it is the least processed form of garlic available in the database, aligning with Rule 4 (Consider the Amount of Processing Performed) and Rule 5 (If Multiple Viable Options Have Similar Processing Levels, choose the one with the highest emission factor).
